english_example_sentence: If he wins the difficult competition, his family will be proud of him.
russian_example_sentence: Если он выиграет сложное соревнование, его семья будет им гордиться.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer o zorlu yarışmayı kazansa, ailesi onunla gurur duyar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eğer o zorlu yarışmayı ______, ailesi onunla gurur duyar.
